      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PropertiesStoreProvider RawStoresFactory.createMemoryStoreProvider(PropertiesStore propertiesStore)
      Uses a MemoryStoreProvider to adapt a PropertiesStore to a PropertiesStoreProvider.
      PropertiesStoreProvider RawStoresFactory.createServerPropertiesStoreProvider(AcrolinxClient client, Localizer localizer)
      Creates a PropertiesStoreProvider providing a PropertiesStore using a server connection to store the properties.

    • Uses of PropertiesStoreProvider in com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.storage

      Classes in com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.storage that implement PropertiesStoreProvider 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MemoryStoreProvider
      Use a MemoryStoreProvider to adapt a PropertiesStore to a PropertiesStoreProvider.
      class  ServerPropertiesStoreProvider
      The ServerPropertiesStoreProvider is used to provide a server-based PropertiesStore for the ConnectionSettings.
